properties.Observatio: Difficult to reach to water source. There are no boundaries. This area may be about  10 perches of which about 50% are large trees. There is water stock tank, but no  water filtration system.

properties.Observatio: This tube well is not operational.
properties.Descriptio:
Drilling of tube well (5m deep) with supplying and fixing of 0.5 HP x 4" Dia tube well pump including all necessary connections and constructing a protective cell for the pump and mounting the same to good working order
